citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
The written program of veterinary care, for all of the covered species of animals present, was not available for review. A
written program of veterinary care is necessary to indicate the care that is to be provided for the farm animals, rabbits and
birds that are utilized for exhibition.
Each dealer and exhibitor shall employ an attending veterinarian under formal arrangements. In the case of a part-time
attending veterinarian or consultant arrangements, the formal arrangements shall include a written program of veterinary
care and regularly scheduled visits to the premises of the dealer or exhibitor;
***The completed, written program of veterinary care was provided on Monday, July 15, 2024.***
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “C” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the
applicant.
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires.
n

narrative:
2.40(a)(1) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
The written program of veterinary care, for all of the covered species of animals present, was not available for review. A 
written program of veterinary care is necessary to indicate the care that is to be provided for the farm animals, rabbits and 
birds that are utilized for exhibition. 
 
Each dealer and exhibitor shall employ an attending veterinarian under formal arrangements. In the case of a part-time 
attending veterinarian or consultant arrangements, the formal arrangements shall include a written program of veterinary 
care and regularly scheduled visits to the premises of the dealer or exhibitor; 
 
***The completed, written program of veterinary care was provided on Monday, July 15, 2024.*** 
 
This is a 1st Re-License Inspection for a Class “C” license. The inspection and exit briefing were conducted with the 
applicant. 
 
Regulated activity can continue under your existing USDA license until it expires. 
 
 n
